candidates.title: Move test to example
candidates.body: Move the old test to the examples folder. Aligns better with our new format. Fixed a typo in raw.rs where default keyword was accidentally on a new line.

candidates.title: docs: Update CHANGELOG for new release
candidates.body: Title says it all. Thoughts on waiting for #302 / #335?

candidates.title: apply no_color w/ windows cfg
candidates.body: Test MR to add windows support to #302

candidates.title: ci: add auditing and fix cve
candidates.body: Address #299 and adds a CI check to ensure compliance going forward.

candidates.title: chore(deps): Bump deps
candidates.body:
Glad to see the PR moving again.
This PR will bump a series of dependencies.

 Bump `arc-swap` from 1.2 to 1.6.
 Bump `humantime` from 2.0 to 2.1.
 Bump `serde_yaml` from 0.8.4 to 0.9.
 Bump `toml` from 0.5 to 0.8.
 Bump `parking_lot` from 2.0 to 2.1.
 Bump `derivative` from 2.1.1 to 2.2.
 Bump `tempfile` from 3.1.0 to 3.8.

candidates.title: chore: update Rust version for latest log crate compatibility
candidates.body: Upgrade minimum rust version to 1.60 to allow usage of the latest log crate.

candidates.title: Add documentation covering all current aspects of the configuration file
candidates.body:
Add a markdown document detailing all the configuration options provided by log4rs.

Fixes: #291
Fixes: #304
Fixes: #306

candidates.title: add trigger kind "time" in rolling_file
candidates.body: I add the trigger kind "time" in rolling_file. It can be set with limit like 5second, 10minute, 1day, 3weeks...It may be able to solve the Issue #235. I referred to #139  and thank for @SSebo

candidates.title: Create an example of logging with file rotation
candidates.body: I've also added a small snippet at the bottom to generate log message. I can remove this if it is not desirable

candidates.title: fix:Update typemap to use orphanage-rs impl
candidates.body:
Moves the typemap to point at the orphanage-rs implementation so we can address CVEs
Signed-off-by: Anton Whalley <anton@venshare.com>
